lead_paragraph: A Communist Party official will take the helm of Dongfeng Motor, which has joint ventures with Nissan Motor and Honda Motor in China.

headline.main: China Appoints New Chair of State-Owned Automaker
headline.print_headline: China Appoints New Chairman of State-Owned Automaker

snippet: A Communist Party official will take the helm of Dongfeng Motor, which has joint ventures with Nissan Motor and Honda Motor in China.
